titleStmt.title: The beavvties of Beth-el Containing: sundry reasons why euery Christian ought to account one day in the courtes of God, better then a thousand besides. Preached in Cambridge, and now published especially for the benefite of those that were the hearers.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Thomas Man, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster-row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pater-noster-row, at the signe of the Talbot
